nodes.text: The Aloo family was a wealthy and influential human family from the ecumenopolis of Coruscant. They also owned a residence on Centax-3, one of Coruscant's moons. Under the rule of the Galactic Empire, Sim Aloo was one of Emperor Palpatine's closest advisers. His daughter Alinka helped him take care of the family business and retrieve Sith artifacts for the Emperor.
